column4: does anyone know if i can get  a newer xchat repo or deb for 8.0.4
what's the version in Jaunty? that will be easy to get if it doesn't require any dependencies
actually the Jaunty idea is bad, it requires a bunch of dependencies that are probably only found in Jaunty. You can compile xchat yourself if you feel comfortable in the command line
i know and i know but thanks anyway
